sentence.Network_en: Three-fourths of the apartments in the ghetto had no heat.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫民区有3/4的公寓没有暖气。

sentence.Network_en: Government expenditures absorbed nearly three-fourths of the national income.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府开支耗费了将近3/4的国民收入。

sentence.Network_en: The ranch castrated three - fourths of its male calves.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧场把 四分之三 的小公牛都阉割了.

list.abs: 分数用英语怎么表示如三分之五_百度知道 ... 三分之二: two thirds 四分之三: three fourths 二分之一: half.

entry.def: In American English, people sometimes use three-fourths to mean three-quarters .

example.ex: Three-fourths of the apartments in the ghetto had no heat...
example.tran: 贫民区有 3/4 的公寓没有暖气。

example.ex: Government expenditures absorbed nearly three-fourths of the national income.
example.tran: 政府开支耗费了将近 3/4 的国民收入。
